preqs: Completion of any compulsory units such as Australian legal system.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG} owned by {50000567}
Incompatible with course version in {L6005} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT}

time: Summer semester A (starts November) 2017 (On-campus block of classes)

description: In this unit, taken in the last or penultimate semester, masters coursework students apply research, thinking and communication skills and specialist discipline knowledge to complete a research project with independence. Students will audit another masters elective unit offered in the same teaching period in their area of specialization, and will complete a research project in the subject area of the audited unit.
